pirate there ever was! I'm proud as anything
to be yer son, and I hope ye can forgive me
for bein' so green in the piratin' ways.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
You too, Cap'n? Cripes, I guess this
really is Deus Maris's power...

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Good! Good on both of ya! Now let all that
transpired between us be water under the
bridge, for Sigurd the pirate has a heart
broad as the Mare Nostrum herself!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
...Er, yer not bowin' to me.
I thought there'd be some bowin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sorry, fella, but Deus Maris says I'll get
my spirit power if I take you down,
so that's what I'm gonna do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
What have I done? How could I have
ever thought favorably of Sigurd?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, I was never thinkin' I'd want
to be a pirate neither.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Welp, I got my spirit power, Cap'n,
so looks like it's time for me to split.
Thanks for all the help.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, and where do I go then, minnow?
Ye be the only man what can steer
this barnacle-blasted ship!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Eh, I think Azure can handle it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, and there goes the minnow... Well, if it be Deus Maris's will that we fell
into the Sea Betwixt together, I suppose I can't
be arguin'. Perhaps he even be an envoy from
Deus Maris himself! What think ye, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
My wish didn't come true...
I have to start completely over...

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, what in all the waters
were ye wishin' for, lass!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I be so annoyed and bitter...
I'll never be forgivin' that woman!
Somebody fight me! I'll take ye all on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text: Yar, this be a pirate Azure killed.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
She seems pretty ticked off, all right.
Still, she'll probably tucker down once
we fight her, so let's give it a shot.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Gar, I was meant to rule the Mare Nostrum!
If only I be havin' Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Does EVERY pirate want to rule the seas?
I mean, what would that even look like?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I not be understandin' pirates,
for I be not one.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I have to give this back to...
But wait, where is...?
Where am I...?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
You're in the Sea Betwixt.
Who you looking for there?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I... I can't remember the name. I've been
here so long that my memory is...lost.
But I think...they're at the harbor?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Please... Take this and give it to them...
I have no time left...

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
An axe? 'Tis a bit rusted, but...
Gar, hold on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Aye, I see. If we get back to life,
let's be returnin' this to the owner.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Not sure I really follow any of this,
but I'll make sure to take good care
of it until that whole deal happens.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Well, well! If it isn't Ivar! I heard you sunk
to the bottom of the seas and left this world.
...Er, you're not a ghost or anything, right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Nay, ye blind barnacle! I be alive!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
That's...that's my axe!
Where did you find it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I lent that axe to the man I loved—but when
he went off to hunt pirates, I never saw
him again. I'd thought this lost at sea...

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Ye used to use that axe, lass?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I had my own reckless youth,
thank you very much! But here. Take this new axe as
thanks for returning my own.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
The less we think about this, the better.
In fact, let's just forget it ever happened.
Gar, and here I was thinkin' ghosts were
as spooky as things were gonna get today...

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Doesn't look like anyone's around.
The heck's going on here?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
The ship itself still be havin'
powerful, unresolved feelings.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text: Think you lost me there, guy.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, I see... The ship wants us
to find out where it be!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Guess men of the sea know how ships feel?
Well, if it wants to know, we should probably
search for it in the Sea of the Living.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
But we gotta get back to life first.
Think you can wait that long, bud?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
I can feel that ship's emotions here.
Where is it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Gar, I see shipwrecked parts scattered all
over the place... Perhaps it merely be
wantin' to return to the sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
I think we can make that happen.
Give a fella a hand, Cap'n?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, a raft also be a ship.
Well done, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Welp, let's see this abandoned raft off.
Also, I feel strangely accomplished.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Aye, and I wager this ship be deeply
touched as well. Fine job indeed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
And she gave something to us at some point, too.
Gotta tell you, Cap'n, that ship felt an awful lot
like a person to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
What? Fine, I'll be doin' it.
Give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
She's a bit off-kilter, but it be fine,
for a raft also be a ship! Well done, me!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
I pray someone might hear my song!
Listen and remember and pass it along!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: Ye want us to remember yer song?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Exactly. Do you think you can remember
what I sing, then pass the message on? ...I'll take that as a yes. Right, then!
Settle down and listen to what I call
the Ballad of the Lighthouse!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Way up atop the lighthouse
lived a science man!
He made a great big something
that he kept from all the land!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
So we just tell the scientist:
you must join that green wire!
Just slap that thing together
and your skill we will admire! Doobie doobie do! She bop bop BAO!
Scat doobide dat and a la la la!
Ha cha cha cha!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Hooo! Okay, I feel a lot better.
Thanks for listening, byeee!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Can't say I cared much for the
improv bit there at the end,
but I'm glad they found peace. Guess we should go swing by the
lighthouse and chat up the scientist?

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, there you are! Hey, so we've
got a message for you, fella.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well? Get to it already!
I'm a very busy man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Yar, it be somethin' about a wire,
but the color escapes me...

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that red wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that blue wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that green wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, bless you! I finally solved it
after so many years! And since that was my magnum opus,
you'd best enjoy it once you return
to life! Hee hee!

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well, that was confusing as all heck.
Guess we just gotta return to life
and see what all the fuss is about.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Tarnation! I failed miserably
and it's all YOUR fault! Eh, oh well. At this point, I'll just
enjoy myself here in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Guy seems pretty happy about failing.
Guess this place is surprisingly
comfortable for ghosts, maybe?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Please, someone save poor little me!
My fiancé was killed by fiends!
HEY! HEY! IT'S ME, PEDRO THE FIEND! GET OUTTA HERE, HUMANS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Nooo, think he called
himself a fiend there.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: I'M A FIEND! A TERRIBLE FIEND! RUN AWAY! RUN, COWARDS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: How about we just fight instead?

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Well, that's just sloppy! We can't
do our work if you act like that.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Avast, ye be the thieves! The ones trickin'
honest folk outta their belongings! Avast,
but that be worse than piratin', says I!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, I'm sort of at a loss
for words over here.

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: NOPE! NOPE! JUST CLEARING MY THROAT! HERE! TAKE IT BACK! EVERYTHING I STOLE! OH, AND HERE'S SOME LOOT! NICE LOOT! FOUND IT ON THE GROUND AND EVERYTHING!

SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W04_GIMK_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Eh, whatever. Not worth the trouble.
Let's just leave this be.

SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_MIDO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Tsunanori Mido's maximum LP decreased by 1.
